org.switchyard.admin.mbean

Interface ApplicationMXBean


  • public interface ApplicationMXBean
    Management interface for a SwitchYard application.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ObjectName getComponentService(String componentServiceName)
      Provides the ObjectName for the management interface of a component service in this application.
      List<String> getComponentServices()
      Returns a list of names of component services for this application.
      String getConfig()
      Return the application descriptor.
      String getName()
      Returns the name of the application.
      ObjectName getReference(String referenceName)
      Provides the ObjectName for the management interface of a composite reference in this application.
      List<String> getReferences()
      Returns a list of composite references consumed by the application.
      ObjectName getService(String serviceName)
      Provides the ObjectName for the management interface of a composite service in this application.
      List<String> getServices()
      Returns a list of composite services provided by the application.
      List<ObjectName> getTransformers()
      Provides a list of ObjectNames for the management interfaces for all transformers in this application.
      List<ObjectName> getValidators()
      Provides a list of ObjectNames for the management interfaces for all validators in this application.

    • Method Detail

      • getServices

        List<String> getServices()
        Returns a list of composite services provided by the application.
        Returns:
        composite services provided by the application.

      • getService

        ObjectName getService(String serviceName)
        Provides the ObjectName for the management interface of a composite service in this application.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the name of a service provided by this application.
        Returns:
        the object name for the service's management interface, may be null

      • getReferences

        List<String> getReferences()
        Returns a list of composite references consumed by the application.
        Returns:
        composite references consumed by the application.

      • getReference

        ObjectName getReference(String referenceName)
        Provides the ObjectName for the management interface of a composite reference in this application.
        Parameters:
        referenceName - the name of a reference consumed by this application.
        Returns:
        the object name for the reference's management interface, may be null

      • getComponentServices

        List<String> getComponentServices()
        Returns a list of names of component services for this application.
        Returns:
        names of component services contained by this application.

      • getComponentService

        ObjectName getComponentService(String componentServiceName)
        Provides the ObjectName for the management interface of a component service in this application.
        Parameters:
        componentServiceName - the name of a component service contained in this application.
        Returns:
        the object name for the component service's management interface, may be null

      • getTransformers

        List<ObjectName> getTransformers()
        Provides a list of ObjectNames for the management interfaces for all transformers in this application.
        Returns:
        list of ObjectNames

      • getValidators

        List<ObjectName> getValidators()
        Provides a list of ObjectNames for the management interfaces for all validators in this application.
        Returns:
        list of ObjectNames

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of the application.
        Returns:
        the name of this application.

      • getConfig

        String getConfig()
        Return the application descriptor.
        Returns:
        the config model for the application descriptor
